sentences.en: He is the bowler-hatted figure in the foreground of Orpen's famous painting.
sentences.cn: 他是奥彭那幅名画中位于前景的戴圆顶硬礼帽的那个人物。

sentences.en: He's become the foreground of public attention.
sentences.cn: 他成了万众瞩目的人物.

sentences.en: I'm going to paint in the foreground.
sentences.cn: 我打算把前景加画进去.

sentences.en: She likes to keep herself in the foreground.
sentences.cn: 她喜欢让自己处于最引人注意的地位.

sentences.en: The figure in the foreground is the artist's mother.
sentences.cn: 图画前景中的人是画家的母亲。

sentences.en: The foreground for the cooperation between China and UAE in the energy field is amplitude.
sentences.cn: 中阿能源领域合作势头好，前景广阔。

sentences.en: The foreground, nearest the viewer, is painted last.
sentences.cn: 距离观者最近的前景是最后才画的。

sentences.en: The painter painted in the foreground.
The red figure in the foreground is the artist's mother.
sentences.cn: 画面前景中穿红衣服的人是画家的母亲.

sentences.en: The spire of the tower dominates the foreground.
sentences.cn: 塔尖在前景中占了主要地位.

sentences.en: There were three figures in the foreground.
These teachers are keeping education in the foreground of public attention.
sentences.cn: 这些教师不断努力以使人人关心教育事业.

sentences.en: This is a photograph of our house, with a big tree in the foreground.
sentences.cn: 这是我家住宅的照片, 宅前是一株大树.

sentences.en: Try to draw the figures in the foreground in proportion.
sentences.cn: 要把前景中的人物画得合比例.

trans.tran_cn: 前景，突出的地方， 最显著的位置
trans.tran_en: the part of the view in a picture or a photograph that is closest to you when you are looking at it
